item.title: Star-Studded Kering Foundation Dinner Raises More Than $4.5M to Combat Violence Against Women
item.description: Salma Hayek Pinault, Jessica Chastain, Demi Moore, Dakota Johnson and Colman Domingo mixed with Jeff Koons, Anna Wintour and other A-listers to raise awareness and funds for women-focused NGOs.

item.title: TUNL Gala Returns to New York Fashion Week, Featuring a Performance By Gunna
item.description: The event — which combines sports, fashion and culture — is back for its second year, this time hosted by NBA star Cade Cunningham.

item.title: Best Dressed Stars at the 2025 MTV VMAs: Doja Cat, Sabrina Carpenter, Ariana Grande and More
item.description: Tate McRae, GloRilla, Ricky Martin and LL Cool J also were among the artists who blended high-end style with whimsy, perfect for MTV’s big night.

item.title: MTV VMAs: Sabrina Carpenter, Ariana Grande and More Stars on the Red Carpet
item.description: Stars were out in full force at the MTV Video Music Awards ceremony, which was held at UBS Arena on Sept. 7 in Long Island, New York.

item.title: How Michael Ovitz Turned Armani Into Hollywood’s Power Uniform
item.description: “We sent all our executives to the Beverly Hills [Armani] store to buy, because it was the look we wanted,” says the legendary superagent, who co-founded CAA in 1975.

item.title: How Giorgio Armani Conquered Hollywood — And Changed the Red Carpet Forever
item.description: Call it the ‘American Gigolo’ effect: Beginning in the ’80s, the late Italian couturier’s elegantly swaggering designs were inescapable, from the agency boardrooms to the Oscars stage.

item.title: How Giorgio Armani Conquered Hollywood — And Changed the Red Carpet Forever
item.description: Call it the ‘American Gigolo’ effect: Beginning in the ’80s, the late Italian couturier’s elegantly swaggering designs were inescapable, from the agency boardrooms to the Oscars stage.

item.description: The Sept. 11 event will be hosted by Salma Hayek Pinault, François-Henri Pinault, Colman Domingo, Demi Moore, Dolores Huerta, Jeff Koons, Jessica Chastain, Julianne Moore and Madonna.

item.title: Giorgio Armani, Hollywood-Beloved Italian Fashion Designer, Dies at 91
item.description: The company he founded announced on Thursday that the legendary designer died at his home in Milan.
